title: Some keyboard buttons don't work in game! Help?!
body: Since some days, Im not able to use the keyborad buttons "a,s,f" in game. Can't use them either for spells neither in the chat. But those keyboard buttons do work in the normal client and also everywhere else... Help!?

replies.body: Do you notice any other things going on when this happens? Any champs or minions running in place, health bars not changing or any *Attempting to reconnect* messages? This could be caused by a few things, I just wanted a few more details so I can be sure.

None of these happen. The only thing i didn't mentioned is that, everytime i press "s" there is some strange noise coming. Even after I turned off the entire in-game sound, there was still this noise. And it was as loud as before.

It's possible that the configuration files that save your key bindings are corrupt. I suggest completing a reset of those files with the following steps. 

First, **log into the League Client** then minimize it and navigate to your config folder, which should be in this directory:

>**C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config**

Delete these two files:
**- input.ini
- PersistedSettings.json**

Once you've deleted those files, bring the League Client back up so you can hop into a custom match and test if your settings will now save. Keep in mind that your settings in-game will be reset to default, so you'll need to redo any custom configurations you had previously set up.

Let me know if this resolved the issue for you.
I followed all these steps, but still got those problems...

No worries! We'll get to the bottom of this, but we'll need to escalate this to our tech team from here out. I recommend grabbing some system logs with our [**HRT Application**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) before attaching those zipped logs to a [**support ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can get back to you.

If you have any issues submitting your ticket, let me know.
Btw thanks for all your hard work ^^
Wow... It really worked. Thank you a lot again <3
